News.Title: Kunal Mehta reduces stake in R M Drip and Sprinklers
News.Summary: Kunal Haresh Mehta and PAC Smita Mehta sold shares in R M Drip and Sprinklers Systems through open market transactions, reducing their combined holding from 20.75% to 18.20% during December 2025-February 2026.

News.Title: RM Drip Systems Independent Director Resigns
News.Summary: RM Drip and Sprinklers Systems Limited announces resignation of Independent Director Mrs. Kavita Ashish Pandare due to personal considerations, effective January 29, 2026.

News.Title: RM Drip & Sprinklers Q3 profit jumps 38% YoY
News.Summary: RM Drip & Sprinklers Systems reported strong Q3 performance with net profit rising to ₹141 million from ₹102 million YoY, while revenue surged 55% to ₹746 million.

News.Title: RM Drip Acquires Land for New Manufacturing Unit
News.Summary: RM Drip and Sprinklers Systems completes land acquisition through subsidiary Brahmanand Pipes for new manufacturing facility at Sinnar, Maharashtra with 12,000 MT annual capacity.

News.Title: R.M Drip Board Meet Set for Jan 29 for Q3 Results
News.Summary: R.M Drip And Sprinklers Systems Limited has scheduled its board meeting for January 29, 2026, to consider Q3FY26 unaudited financial results for quarter ended December 31, 2025.

News.Title: R M Drip Systems Boosts Production Capacity by 50%
News.Summary: R M Drip And Sprinklers Systems announces significant manufacturing expansion to increase production capacity by approximately 50%, aimed at enhancing operations and strengthening market position.

News.Title: RM Drip announces 50% capacity expansion with new unit
News.Summary: RM Drip and Sprinklers Systems Limited announces establishment of new manufacturing facility at Sinnar, Maharashtra, adding 12,000 metric tonnes annual capacity through subsidiary Brahmanand Pipes Private Limited.

News.Title: R M Drip Sets Up New Manufacturing Unit in Maharashtra
News.Summary: R M Drip And Sprinklers Systems Limited announces setup of new manufacturing unit under Brahmanand Pipes Private Limited in Sinnar District, Nashik, Maharashtra with 12,000 MT annual capacity.

News.Title: R M Drip Board Approves Brahmanand Pipes Acquisition
News.Summary: R M Drip And Sprinklers Systems Limited's board has approved the acquisition of Brahmanand Pipes Private Limited, marking a strategic expansion move for the irrigation systems company.

News.Title: RM Drip Announces ₹10 Lakh Acquisition of Brahmanand Pipes
News.Summary: RM Drip And Sprinklers Systems Limited announces proposed acquisition of Brahmanand Pipes Private Limited for ₹10.00 lakh to expand manufacturing capabilities and meet growing demand.
